title: Bessent believes Fed rates are 'substantially above' the neutral
full_text: Bessent believes Fed rates are 'substantially above' the neutral. US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has his eye on interest rates in 2026, telling the Economic Club of Minnesota on Thursday that the Federal Reserve is.... Treasury Secretary Scott Besant says the Federal Reserve needs to do its part to boost investment in the economy and says that interest rates need to be substantially lower.
